mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectInfAllAddrBuldInfo Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ BULD_MANAGE_NO , SUD_CD , SIDO_NM , SIGNGU_NM , LEGALEMDNM , LEGALRINM , MTN_YN , LNM_MNNM , LNM_SLNO , ROAD_NM_CD , ROAD_NM , UNDGRND_YN , BULD_MNNM , BULD_SLNO , BILDNG_REGTER_BULD_NM , DETAIL_BULD_NM , EMD_SN , AUD_CD , AUD_NM , POST_NO , POST_SN , MUCH_DLVSP_NM , MVMT_RESN_CD , NTFC_DATE , MOD_BF_ROAD_NM_ADDR , SIGNGU_BULD_NM , COPERTN_HUS_YN , BSIS_ZONE_NO , DETAIL_ADDR_YN , RM_1 , RM_2 , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM INF_ALL_ADDR_BULD_INFO WHERE 1 = 1 AND BULD_MANAGE_NO = #{buldManageNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: DELETE /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.deleteInfAllAddrBuldInfo Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ FROM INF_ALL_ADDR_BULD_INFO WHERE 1 = 1 AND BULD_MANAGE_NO = #{buldManageNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
